column1: Visitation and a rosary service were held Friday
column3: 2015 at Darling-Mouser Funeral Home. The Funeral Mass will be at 10:00 a.m. Saturday
column5: 1218 E. Jefferson St. Committal services will follow at Buena Vista Burial Park. Military honors will be conducted by Mr. Luis Lucio and the VFW Post 2035 at the graveside.
